product_name: Topeak Explorer 29er Rack with Disc Mounts
long_description: This Topeak Explorer 29er rear rack design accommodates disc brakes on your 29er and works great for everything from loaded touring to commuting to around-town errands. 6061-T6 hollow aluminum tubes and stainless-steel hardware make it strong and lightweight. QuickTrack(TM) mounting system allows easy and secure attachment of Topeak MTX-series trunk bag; bag simply slides on and locks in place (bag sold separately). Solid rack top acts as a fender to deflect road spray. The Topeak Explorer 29er rear rack has a taillight mount (light sold separately) and comes with all mounting hardware.
short_description: This Topeak Explorer 29er rear rack design accommodates disc brakes on your 29er and works great for everything from loaded touring to commuting to around-town errands.
